content.question: Which of the following mathematical expressions can be used to determine the approximate <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of buffer 1 ?

choices.label: <math alttext="p H equals the negative log of 2.1 times 10 to the negative 4 power, plus the log of the fraction 0.100 over 0.150, equals 3.50" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mtext>log</mtext></mrow><mtext>(</mtext><mn>2.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>)</mtext><mo>+</mo><mtext>log</mtext><mo>(</mo><mtext></mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.100</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.150</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>3.50</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="p H equals the negative log of 2.1 times 10 to the negative 4 power, plus the log of the fraction 0.150 over 0.100, equals 3.85" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mtext>log</mtext></mrow><mtext>(</mtext><mn>2.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>)</mtext><mo>+</mo><mtext>log</mtext><mo>(</mo><mtext></mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.150</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.100</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>3.85</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="p H equals, open bracket, 14.00 plus the log of 2.1 times 10 to the negative 4 power, close bracket, plus the log of the fraction 0.100 over 0.150, equals 10.15" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>[</mtext><mn>14.00</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><mtext>log</mtext></mrow><mtext>(</mtext><mn>2.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>)]</mtext><mo>+</mo><mtext>log</mtext><mo>(</mo><mtext></mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.100</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.150</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>10.15</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="p H equals, open bracket, 14.00 plus the log of 2.1 times 10 to the negative 4 power, close bracket, plus the log of the fraction 0.150 over 0.100, equals 10.50" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>[</mtext><mn>14.00</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><mtext>log</mtext></mrow><mtext>(</mtext><mn>2.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>)]</mtext><mo>+</mo><mtext>log</mtext><mo>(</mo><mtext></mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.150</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.100</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>10.50</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="p H equals, open bracket, 14.00 plus the log of 2.1 times 10 to the negative 4 power, close bracket, plus the log of the fraction 0.100 over 0.150, equals 10.15" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>[</mtext><mn>14.00</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><mtext>log</mtext></mrow><mtext>(</mtext><mn>2.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>)]</mtext><mo>+</mo><mtext>log</mtext><mo>(</mo><mtext></mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.100</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.150</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>10.15</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
